Title: Make Your Own Stargazing Flashlight
Content: Cut the red plastic or cloth into a square. The square should be slightly larger than the lighted end of the flashlight.
Cover the lighted end of the flashlight with the red plastic or cloth. Wrap the edges of the plastic or cloth around the sides of the flashlight.
S͟e͟c͟u͟r͟e the plastic or cloth to the flashlight with the rubber band.
Your stargazing flashlight will look like this.
Now you are ready to head outside for your own nighttime star party!
